title: Chhandamtu kawng tluanin min hruai
lyrics:
Chhandamtu'n kawng tluanin min hruai,
Eng dang nge ka ngaih tawh ang?
Dam chhung min hruaitu zahngaihna,
Ka ringhlel thei dawn em ni?
Van muanna, lawmna hlu ber chu,
Rinna zarah ka lo nei,
Ka chungah eng pawh lo thleng se,}2
Ka thatna turin a ti.}

Chhandamtu'n kawng tluanin min hruai,
Ka kalna a tihlim thin,
Fiahna tinah m in awmpuiin,
Nunna chhangin min chawm thin.
Kawngah chauvin tlu mah ila,
Ka thlarau tuihal mah se;
Ngai teh, ka hma lungpuia chhuak,}2
Lawmna lui luang chu ka hmu.}

Chhandamtu'n kawng tluanin min hruai,
A hmangaih a va mak em!
Chawlhna kim ka tan a lo tiam,
Ka Pa in van sangah khian.
Ka thlarau chatuan nun changin,
Ram ni eng a thlen hun chuan;
Hei hi chatuana ka hla tur,}2
Isuan kawng tluanin min hruai.}
